author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Revert parts of r24274 and r24290.  These were cleanups to the
info code which attempted to consolidate info() and info2() implementations.
However, they proved to be more trouble than they were worth, and after
consultation on irc, it was suggested that separate implementations are
Note that this isn't a straight-forward revert due to changes to the info
handling code which have happened between now and r24290.  Specifically,
this change maintains the callback-based implementation for info2 added in
r24349 and the cleanups in r24491.
This also reverts the XFAIL test added in r24492.
(info2): Renamed from info(), since there are now separate implementations.
Remove wcPath caching calls to InfoCallback.
(info, info_baton, createJavaInfo): Resurrect as found in r24274.
(createJavaInfo2): Remove datastructures which were required for backward
(info): Revert back to the native implementation.
(Info2): Unextend from Info, and re-add datastructures which are required

author: dlr
msg: JavaHL: Improve implementation of WC state regression test API.
Note: This commit accidentally injected an incorrect change which
causes test failures.  It was corrected in r24532.
(check): Cleanup formatting and improve error messages.

author: dlr
msg: A follow-up to r24510, fixing the semantics of svn_client_list() API
to equate non-recursive with svn_depth_immediates (rather than
svn_depth_files), thus retaining compatibility with previous behavior.
(svn_client_list): Explicitly convert RECURSE to depth, rather than
using the SVN_DEPTH_FROM_RECURSE() macro, which equates

author: jszakmeister
msg: Remove an unused function which was intended to be used when trying
to change the unchangeable named transaction in the filesystem.
